title: How to Use our 20V MAX* AutoSense™ Drill
description:
• AutoSense™ technology offers automatic clutch for simpler and better results while driving screws.
• High performance motor ideal for drilling and driving screws through wood, metal and plastic.
• The Drill Just Got Smarter ™ 
• BLACK+DECKER's most compact cordless drill ever
• Lightweight, powerful, and no more guesswork"

asset.author: BLACK+DECKER
